definition.text: We are not going to run a Live Trading Session just yet, so there is no point in keeping our data mining running at this point.

translations.text: Non ci lanceremo subito in una Live Trading Session, quindi non c'Ã¨ motivo di mantenere attivo il data mining.
Sekarang kita tidak akan menjalankan Live Trading Session, jadi tidak ada gunanya data mining berjalan saat ini.

paragraphs.text: There are two main use cases for running Data Tasks:

translations.text: Ci sono due casi d'uso principali per le Data Tasks:
Ada dua kasusutama untuk menjalankan Data Tasks:

paragraphs.text: To process historic data: You may want to process a datetime range of any given Market to run a Backtesting Session, or to process new indicators.

translations.text: Per processare dati storici: potresti voler elaborare un intervallo di tempo di un Market per una Backtesting Session, o per generare nuovi indicatori.
Untuk memproses data historis: Kamu mungkin ingin memproses range datetime dari Market untuk menjalankan Backtesting Session, atau memproses indicators baru.

paragraphs.text: To run a live session:   Live sessions of different types, like Paper Trading Session, Forward Testing Session, and Live Trading Session, all need a live market feed.

translations.text: Per eseguire una live session: live session di tipo diverso, come Paper Trading Session, Forward Testing Session e Live Trading Session, hanno tutte bisogno di un market feed live.
Untuk menjalankan live session: Live sessions dari tipe berbeda, seperti Paper Trading Session, Forward Testing Session, dan Live Trading Session, membutuhkan umpan live market.

paragraphs.text: If all processes are up to date, then select Stop All Tasks in the Masters Task Manager. If not, wait a bit longer!

translations.text: Se tutti i processi sono up to date, seleziona Stop All Tasks nel Task Manager. Altrimenti aspetta ancora un po'.
Jika semua proses up to date, pilih Stop All Tasks pada Masters Task Manager. Jika tidak, tunggu lebih lama!
